text: geuleonhuedo seolo salsaeng-eul ha go jugeojilobuteo chubang-eul hamyeo joe aggwa angsim-eul joseonghago pologa doel ttaeneun boseoggeum-eul galchwihadoda sillo geudeul-eul chubanghaneun geos-eun bulbeob-imyeo seongseoui ilbuman midgo ilbuleul bulsin haneun ja geudeul-eul wihan hyeonse-ui bo sang-eun mueos-igessneunyo sillo isaeng-eseo chiyog-i iss-eul ppun-imyeo simpan-ui nal eom han eungbeol-i iss-eul geos-ila sillo hana nimkkeseoneun neohoega haenghaneun modeun geos eul algo gyesim-ila
